titleStmt.title: A short report of the honourable iourney into Brabant by his excellencie Graue Mauris, gouernour and Lord Generall of the vnited Netherlandish Prouinces: from the 26. day of Iune, to the 19. day of Iuly, 1602. Together with the taking of Helmont, and of his marching to the strong towne of Graue. Translated out of the Dutch copie printed at Vtricht.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for Thomas Pauier, and are to be sold at his shop in Corn-hill neare the exchange, at the signe of the Cat and Parrots,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
